title: BRIEF-Singulus Technologies Redemption Of Annual Forecast For Sales And Earnings
text:
BRIEF-Singulus Technologies Redemption Of Annual Forecast For Sales And Earnings

Stock Markets 23 minutes ago (Sep 08, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Singulus Technologies Redemption Of Annual Forecast For Sales And Earnings Sept 8 (Reuters) - Singulus Technologies AG : * DGAP-ADHOC: SINGULUS TECHNOLOGIES AG: ORDER INTAKE STILL DELAYED - REDEMPTION OF THE ANNUAL FORECAST FOR SALES AND EARNINGS * SINGULUS TECHNOLOGIES - CNBM GROUP INFORMED EXECUTIVE BOARD OF SINGULUS THAT SIGNING OF CONTRACTS WILL PROBABLY NOT BE COMPLETED UNTIL Q4 OF 2019 * SINGULUS-DUE TO ADDITIONAL DELAY IN CONCLUSION OF DELIVERY CONTRACTS,CO WILL NOT ACHIEVE SALES & EARNINGS TARGETS COMMUNICATED FOR BUSINESS YEAR 2019

BRIEF-Singulus Technologies Redemption Of Annual Forecast For Sales And Earnings
description: BRIEF-Singulus Technologies Redemption Of Annual Forecast For Sales And Earnings
